recipes.label: Trade Stories at the Ecdysis Club
recipes.startdescription: At the Ecdysis they prefer to portray their stories non-verbally on stage, but the rafters, gossip and secrets are shared in front of mirrors and make up kits.
recipes.description: On late nights, when the performances have ended and the dancer reapply their mortal guises, the topics drift between tabloid hearsay, midnight fancies and backstage speculation.
